sentences.translation: This phone is on special offer.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我在商店里发现一个特价的瓷器，它的价格比市场价低30%。
sentences.traditionalText: 我在商店裡發現一個特價的瓷器，它的價格比市場價低30%。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài shāngdiàn lǐ fāxiàn yīgè tèjià de cíqì, tā de jiàgé bǐ shìchǎng jià dī 30%.
sentences.translation: I found a porcelain ware on special offer in the shop, its price is 30% lower than the market price.
